segments.text: I glance at the kitchen and see the everyday routine turning disastrous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is drying dishes, oblivious to the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading from the sink like a waterfall in the wrong place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how unaware she is of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are climbing for cookies, full of innocent mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool they're using looks so rickety and unsafe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy has his hand deep in the jar, grabbing as many as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister waits patiently below, hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden blooms peacefully, a stark contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is widening, threatening slips and falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This reminds me of simpler times, but with risks hidden everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plate in her hands shines, but the floor is a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hopefully, they all stay safe in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
